recipesJson.name: Prickly Soda
recipesJson.author: Vishousvapez
recipesJson.description:
Fuck a Flavor Ban
Sweetener = Cap Super Sweet 1 drop per 30 ml (Only Thing i measure in drops)
Coolness to liking 
Was inspired by u/Stayberts soda recipes so i made one with the flavor that im a shill for Inw Prickly Pear 
FLV- Citrus Soda - Just try one of Stayberts recipes with this one and youll know why i used it =]
FA- Fuji - I used the fuji as the body for this one to help the Prickly Pear and also goes nicely with the FLV Citrus Soda
Cap- Double Apple - i wanted to boost the peel notes in the mix this also helped provide some body 
Inw-Prickly Pear-  when i got this one i knew i was gunna have alot of fun with it that hybrid (melon/apple) with the same juiciness as INW cactus give that pop
FLV- Wild Melon- this boosts the prickly pear and provides some sweetness
Cap-Hibiscus- Thanks to u/EdibleMalfunction I know how to use this one properly without it this mix just tastes like a flat soda this provide some syruppy goodness that this mix needs
I really hope you enjoy if you have any suggestions or make a remix let me know =]

reviews.text: Super brisk and refreshing, im really enjoying this off of the shake. I was thinking of adding a tad more of citrus soda, but it is perfect at .85%. Great job!

A deliciously crisp and unique blend of melon, apple and pear flavors that compliment one another perfectly. Remniscent of some of the more exotic Jones gourmet sodas-- which I adore. You won't regret mixing this one up! (Note: I didn't have any prickly pear on hand, but vish suggested I substitute 0.75% cactus and 0.75% WF Ripe Pear SC instead).
